subject: Simsson ebrake
description_text: Where is my product I paid for it why is no one responding this is bullshit I want a refund wasting my money on a shitty company

conversations.body_text: Hi William Diaz-Santiago,    Please provide your order number so we can look into it for you. Don't worry.

Hi William Diaz-Santiago,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have arranged for a reshipment for you. Here is your tracking link:  https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/?trknbr=395244345739&trkqual=12029~395244345739~FDEG

wtf is going on i bought your product and nothing literally going on two months. Yaw took my money. Ticket created almost ten days after I bought it this is bullshit. How do you guys get away with fucking people over

Hi William Diaz-Santiago,  We have noticed this issue. Not receiving the goods for two months is our mistake and is completely unacceptable. We are urgently investigating to see if it was caused by a logistics loss. Once the issue is resolved, we will provide appropriate compensation.

#ssn3201 back in early November yaw took my payment why not honor the sale
 what is wrong with your company

Refund please refund please
